biotools.summary:
a package to correct and analyze the diploid Hi-C data.

An integrated package to process diploid Hi-C data.

HiCHap is a Python package designed to process and analyze Hi-C data, primarily the diploid Hi-C data for phased haplotypes.

bioschemas.name: HiCHap

a package to correct and analyze the diploid Hi-C data.

An integrated package to process diploid Hi-C data.

HiCHap is a Python package designed to process and analyze Hi-C data, primarily the diploid Hi-C data for phased haplotypes.
